title: Crime Alert 10.21.22
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.21.22
description:
Mom and children kidnapped by ex.  Mom pushing a stroller parked inside park. Custodian urinates in all drinking water sources in an office. Man charges with manslaughter after a struggle leads a man to be hit by a train. 

For more crime and justice news, go to crimeonline.com
